name: KDevelop Project Data File
summary: Learn about .KDEVELOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Newer versions of KDevelop save project files with a .KDEVPRJ extension.

description: Programming project file created with KDevelop, a KDE software development program; includes project settings and references to files used by the project; saved in a text format that can be edited with a text editor.
